analyzed: bhavanti tasya viṣaye punar punar avagrahāḥ
tīvra āmaya gṛhītāḥ ca mahiṣyaḥ tasya bhūpateḥ
prabhavanti ahi valmīkāḥ prāsāde dvāri maṇḍape
nipatanti mahā ulkāḥ ca bhṛśam bhīma svana anvitāḥ
mantriṇaḥ ca virudhyante matsareṇa parasparam
rajanyām rājate bhīmam aindram dhanuḥ anabhra jam
itas tatas vahni bhayam nagare jāyate bhṛśam
praviśya garbha bhavanam kroṣṭāraḥ ca a nivāritāḥ
krośanti saṃdhyayoḥ bhīmāḥ dīptāyām diśi visvaram
rundhanti nagaram rājñaḥ śatravaḥ bala darpitāḥ
kṛtyākṛtyam na jānāti svayam staimityam āsthitaḥ
svapne pi paśyati ātmānam muṇḍitam nīla vāsasam
tathena gardabha yujā vrajantam dakṣiṇām diśam
ityādi liṅgaiḥ jānīyāt abhicāram sapatna jam
para abhicāra jā kṛtyā rājānam praviśet yadi

original: tāṃ dṛṣṭvā kṣipramevāsau vinaśyati na saṃśayaḥ || 42-25 ||
analyzed: tām dṛṣṭvā kṣipram eva asau vinaśyati na saṃśayaḥ
putrān ca mantriṇaḥ ca api mahiṣīm nagaram tathā
jvālā mālā āvilā kṛtyā sarvam nāśayati kṣaṇāt
para abhicāra nivartanāya nivartaka astra dhāri sudarśana prīṇanam
evam para abhicāreṇa pīḍite nṛpatau svayam
nivartaka astra sahitam bhagavantam mahā dyutim
cakra svarūpiṇam devam bhaktyā saṃtoṣayet tatas
rajatena suvarṇena śilayā tāmrakeṇa vā
sudarśana arcām nirmāya pūjayet sa nivartakam
samālikhya paṭe vā api dhyāyet trailokya pūjitam

original: evaṃ nirmāṇato dhyānāt pūjayā vandanena vā |
analyzed: evam nirmāṇataḥ dhyānāt pūjayā vandanena vā
pratiṣṭhayā vā stotreṇa devam saṃprīṇayet nṛpaḥ

original: evamanye tathā kuryuramātyā vā narā mune |
analyzed: evam anye tathā kuryuḥ amātyāḥ vā narāḥ mune
prītena sudarśanena para abhicāra nirdahanam
tatas prītaḥ sa bhagavān anādinidhanaḥ vibhuḥ
abhicārān para kṛta an āśrita anugraheṇa tu
bhasmīkaroti smṛtyā eva tad prayuktāni api kṣaṇāt
divya astrāṇi upasaṃhāraiḥ astraiḥ vārayati īśvaraḥ
para prayukta kṛtyāyāḥ tad prayoktuḥ ca vināśanam
para prayuktām kṛtyām tu saṃprāptām ati bhīṣaṇām
svayam nirgatya devaḥ asau cakra rūpī jagatpatiḥ

original: bhasmasāt kurute taṃ ca prayoktāraṃ tataḥ param || 42-34 ||
analyzed: bhasmasāt kurute tam ca prayoktāram tatas param
kāśī rāja itihāsa udāharaṇam
tathā eva kāśīrāja ākhyaḥ vārāṇasyām vasan nṛpaḥ
viśveśvaram mahādevam arcayitvā samāhitaḥ

original: p. 405) kṛṣṇoddeśena kṛtyāṃ vai janayāmāsa mohitaḥ |
analyzed: kṛṣṇa uddeśena kṛtyām vai janayāmāsa mohitaḥ
sā samutpāditā kṛtyā vikaṭā bhīma darśanā
dvārakām samanuprāpya kṛṣṇa abhyāsam yayau tadā
tām āpatantīm saṃprekṣya jvālā mālā āvila ānanām
preṣayāmāsa bhagavān sudarśanam anuttamam
sā tam āpatitam dṛṣṭvā sahasra āditya saṃnibham
yathāgatam pradudrāva prayoktāram bhaya āturā

original: sa tāṃ nihatya taṃ cāpi kāśīrājaṃ purīṃ tathā || 42-39 ||
analyzed: sa tām nihatya tam ca api kāśī rājam purīm tathā
ājagāma punar cakram viṣṇu pārśvam mahā dyuti
śruta kīrti upākhyāna udāharaṇam
evam anyat purāvṛttam itihāsam śṛṇuṣva me
rājñā śrutakīrtinā dharmeṇa sapta dvīpa mahī paripālanam
saurāṣṭra adhipatiḥ rājā śrutakīrtiḥ iti śrutaḥ
nivasan bhadraśālāyām nagaryām ari mardanaḥ
gaja aśva ratha saṃpannaḥ balavān vāsava upamaḥ
sudarśane parām bhaktim udvahan arcanā paraḥ
bubhuje tad prasādena sapta dvīpavatīm mahīm
loka antaram jigīṣoḥ tasya sudarśana arcana pūrvakam
svastika ākhya gandharvanagara gamanam
jetum loka antaram cakre śrutakīrtiḥ manaḥ tadā
catur aṅga balaiḥ yuktaḥ samabhyarcya sudarśanam
kāma gam syandanam citram āruroha mahā balaḥ
tatas pratasthe prathamam antarikṣam bala anvitaḥ
svastika nagara varṇanam
tatra gandharvanagaram viśālam svastika āhvayam
vīṇā vinodanena ittham pālitam parama dyuti
svayam pravṛttaiḥ śastraiḥ ca vāryamāṇa ari sainikam
bahis nirindhanena eva vahninā pariveṣṭitam
suvarṇa sālam paramam ratna gopura maṇḍitam
maṇi harmya parikṣiptam gāna svana samākulam
vimānaiḥ taijasaiḥ juṣṭam divya upavana śobhitam
suvarṇa padma sarasī sarit vāpī niṣevitam
sevitam sura nārībhiḥ apsarobhiḥ ca sevitam
gandharvaiḥ kiṃnaraiḥ siddhaiḥ cāraṇaiḥ ca sadā yutam
yuyutsunā śrutakīrtinā tad nagara uparodhaḥ
evaṃvidham puram rājā rurodha bala darpitaḥ
vīṇā vinodanam yoddhum mahatyā senayā tadā
gandharva rājena vāhinī preṣaṇam
śrutvā gandharva rājā upi mānuṣaiḥ uparodhanam
prahasya preṣayāmāsa siddha gandharva vāhinīm
tatra tumula saṃgrāmaḥ

original: sā tena balinā rājñā yuyudhe niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ |
analyzed: sā tena balinā rājñā yuyudhe niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
pravṛttam tat mahat yuddham tumulam roma harṣaṇam
śrutakīrtinā gandharva sainya vidrāvaṇam
tatas vidrāvayāmāsa bhūpatiḥ līlayā balam

original: gāndharvaṃ tat punaḥ prāpa svapurīṃ bhayavihvalam || 42-54 ||
analyzed: gāndharvam tat punar prāpa sva purīm bhaya vihvalam
kruddhasya gandharva rājasya svayam yuddhāya nirgamanam
tat śrutvā parama kruddhaḥ svayam vīṇā vinodanaḥ
ratham mahāntam āsthāya niryayau saha sainikaiḥ
gandharva rāja śrutakīrtyoḥ aṣṭa dina paryantam yuddha pravṛttiḥ
tatas tayoḥ abhūt yuddham vṛtra vāsavayoḥ iva
parasparam nijaghnuḥ te sainikāḥ vividhaiḥ śaraiḥ
tatra saṃchannam ākāśam śara oghaiḥ ubhayoḥ api

original: jayaḥ parājayo vā syānna tatra samitau tayoḥ || 42-57 ||
analyzed: jayaḥ parājayaḥ vā syāt na tatra samitau tayoḥ  /
evam aṣṭa dināni āsīt eka rūpam bhayaṃkaram

original: p. 408) bhūpatinā gandharvarājasya dhanurādicchedo balavidrāvaṇaṃ ca
analyzed: bhūpatinā gandharva rājasya dhanuḥ ādi chedaḥ bala vidrāvaṇam ca
tatas gandharva rājasya ghanuḥ ciccheda bhūpatiḥ
dhvaja chatra hayān ca api sāyakaiḥ nata parvabhiḥ
diśaḥ prasthāpayāmāsa tadīyam sakalam balam
gandharva rājasya viṣādaḥ
śastraiḥ ajayyam ālocya nṛpam gandharva rāj api
parājitam tu sva balam manujaiḥ viṣasāda ha
gandharva rājena mānuṣa bale gāndharva astra prayogaḥ
divya astraiḥ sūdayāmi enam iti matvā mahā dyutiḥ

original: gāndharvamastraṃ cikṣepa sa tasmin mānuṣe bale || 42-61 ||
analyzed: gāndharvam astram cikṣepa sa tasmin mānuṣe bale
tena mānuṣa sainya vimohanam
tena eva mohitā sarvā śruta kīrti varūthinī
gāndharva astra prabhāveṇa tiṣṭhati eva ca saṃyuge
sudarśana prabhāveṇa divya astram nā āpa tam nṛpam
tad pratīkāra aśaktasya śrutakīrteḥ purodhasi sva vṛtta nivedanam
śruta kīrtiḥ tadā astreṣu divyeṣu anabhiyogataḥ
na śaśāka pratīkartum sva purodhasam abhyayāt
vṛttam vijñāpayāmāsa nṛpaḥ tasmai purodhase
purodhasā sudarśana śaraṇa varaṇa upadeśa pūrvakam
nikhila astra mantra upadeśanam
saḥ abhyabhāṣata dharma jñaḥ parama astra viśāradaḥ

original: p. 409) śrutakīrte'tra mā bhaiṣīstameva śaraṇaṃ vraja || 42-65 ||
analyzed: śruta kīrtā itra mā bhaiṣīḥ tam eva śaraṇam vraja
praṇata ārti haram devam sudarśana vapuḥ dharam
divya astrāṇām aśeṣāṇām prasūtim parameśvaram
evam bhūte mahācakre catuḥṣaṣṭi ara saṃyute
nemi dvaya anvite devam madhye dhyāyasva bhūpate
dvi ṣaṣṭi bhujam ati ugram saṃhāra astra dharam param

original: evaṃ dhyātvā ca japtvaitaṃ mantraṃ senāṃ vilokaya || 42-68 ||
analyzed: evam dhyātvā ca japtvā etam mantram senām vilokaya
iti astra mantrān akhilān tasmai upadideśa saḥ
tena jātabalasya śrutakīrteḥ punar yuddhāya āgamanam
pratigṛhya akhilān mantrān pravartaka nivartakān

original: punaretya ca saṃgrāmaṃ sa rājā samitiṃjayaḥ |
analyzed: punar etya ca saṃgrāmam sa rājā samitiṃjayaḥ
tena sva sainika moha vimocanam

original: dhyātvā devaṃ japan mantraṃ svasenāṃ samalokayat || 42-70 ||
analyzed: dhyātvā devam japan mantram sva senām samalokayat  /
tatas saṃjñām avāpya asau prāvartata mahā āhave
punar yuddhe śrutakīrteḥ vijayaḥ gandharva loka vaśīkaraṇam ca
punar pravavṛte yuddham senayoḥ ubhayoḥ api
divya astraiḥ samare rājā jitvā vīṇā vinodanam
tad lokam sva vaśam cakre cakravartī bala anvitaḥ
tatas sva pura pratyāgamanam
satkṛtaḥ siddha gandharvaiḥ kiṃnaraiḥ cāraṇaiḥ api
bhadraśālām punar prāpa sva purīm vijaya śriyā
sameyivān śaśāsa urvīm divam surapatiḥ yathā
sudarśana prabhāvāt vismitasya punar purodhasā saha mantraṇa prakāraḥ
sudarśana prabhāvasya smṛtvā vismita mānasaḥ
purodhasam upāgamya jvalantam iva pāvakam
mantrayāmāsa tena evam rājā rājīva locanaḥ
deva prasādāt jagatī mama iyam
samudra nemiḥ vaśam āgatā adya
loka antaram ca api tathā eva manye
mayi prasāda unmukhaḥ eva devaḥ
bhagavat prasādāt svasya mokṣa lābhe saṃśaya abhāva kathanam
saṃsāra bhītasya mama apavargam
pradāsyate cakra vapuḥ dharaḥ iyam
iti atra śaṅkā mama na asti kāci
dataḥ param devam upāsmahe tu
rājānam prati purodhasā sudarśana pratiṣṭhāpana ādi upadeśaḥ
iti uktavantam nṛpatim purodhāḥ
kṛtāñjalim prāha mahā anubhāvaḥ
vimānam agryam bahu varṇa kūṭam
vidhāya cakra upapadam sa sādhyam
iha pratiṣṭhāpya su cakra madhye
dviṣaṣṭi bāhum sa nivartaka astram
yathā ukta rūpam bahu bhūṣaṇa āḍhyam
sudarśanam pūjaya sarva siddhyai
rājñā tathā eva anuṣṭhānam
iti evam uktaḥ pratigṛhya mūrdhnā
sa tasya vākyam parama artha yuktam
akārayat kārayitavya dakṣa
stathā eva tasmin nagare sa rājā
tad artham rājñā dvijānām vṛtti prakalpanam
śatam sa viṃśati adhikam dvijān tu
samantataḥ devaniketanāt saḥ
tatas pratiṣṭhāpya dhanāni dattvā
bahūni bahvīḥ ca bhuvaḥ sa tebhyaḥ  /
vibhūtimantam ca vidhāya devam
mumoda rājā samavāpta kāmaḥ
tatas bhagavat prasādāt rājñaḥ parama puruṣa artha lābhaḥ
mahālaye tatra samarcya devam
dine dine prāpta samasta kāmaḥ
tatas ucireṇa eva vimukta saṅgaḥ
param padam prāpa ca tad prasādāt
iti śrī pāñcarātre tantra rahasye ahirbudhnyasaṃhitāyām
kāśīrājaśrutakīrtyupākhyānavarṇanam nāma
dvicatvāriṃśaḥ udhyāyaḥ
āditaḥ ślokāḥ
jalaṃdharavadhopāyacintanam nāma tricatvāriṃśaḥ adhyāyaḥ
dhyātam sakṛt bhavān eka koṭi agha ogham harati aram

original: sudarśanasya tad divyaṃ bhargo devasya dhīmahi ||
analyzed: sudarśanasya tat divyam bhargaḥ devasya dhīmahi
kṛtsnasya jagat cakra maya tva kathaṃtā praśnaḥ
nāradaḥ

original: pṛcchāmi tvāṃ punaridaṃ śaṃsa me sakaleśvara |
analyzed: pṛcchāmi tvām punar idam śaṃsa me sakala īśvara
proktam etat purā sarvam jagat cakra mayam tvayā

original: tat kathaṃ spaṣṭamācakṣva kadā devena darśitam |
analyzed: tat katham spaṣṭam ācakṣva kadā devena darśitam
vettā tvam eva na anyaḥ asti tvat ṛte bhuvanatraye
adhyāya dvayena tad uttara kathanāya ākhyāyikā kathane prathamam
ahirbudhnyaḥ
surāḥ ca munayaḥ sarve manuḥ tad sūnavaḥ tathā
rājānaḥ sarva varṇāḥ ca dharma mārga pravartakāḥ
dānava ādīnām dharma vighātaka tvam
tathā eva dānavāḥ sarve bhūta vetāla rākṣasāḥ
krūrāḥ narāḥ ca paśavaḥ bhīma rūpāḥ ca dasyavaḥ

original: tathaiva cāsurīṃ prāptā yonimanye janā mune |
analyzed: tathā eva ca āsurīm prāptāḥ yonim anye janāḥ mune

original: ete sarve sadā dharmavidhvaṃsaṃ kurvate bhṛśam || 43-5 ||
analyzed: ete sarve sadā dharma vidhvaṃsam kurvate bhṛśam
pāpinām vināśa upāya cintayā ahirbudhnyasya meru śikhara gamanam
atas te pāpa karmāṇaḥ kena naśyeyuḥ iti aham
parām cintām upārūḍhaḥ meru kūṭam upāgataḥ
tatra samādhim āsthitasya tasya tejaḥ viśeṣa darśanam
tasmin samādhim āsthāya samāsīnasya me kṣaṇāt
āvirbabhūva durdarśam mahaḥ parama bhāsvaram
bhīti vaśāt ātharvaṇa mantra uccāraṇa pūrvakam punar tad darśanam
tatas tad darśanāt mantram ātharvaṇam udairayam
tam uccaran mahā mantram adrākṣam tat mahaḥ punar
tejaḥ madhye sudarśana puruṣa sākṣātkāra pūrvakam praśnaḥ
tasmin vidīpte mahasi puruṣam kṛṣṇa piṅgalam
ūrdhvaretam virūpa akṣam sahasra āditya saṃnibham
sahasra ara samāyukta cakra madhya sthitam param
jvālā mālā su durdarśam sudarśanam an ākulam
dṛṣṭvā kaḥ tvam kutas kasya iti apṛccham akutobhayam
prītena bhagavatā sva svarūpa khyāpanam

original: tataḥ prītaḥ sa bhagavānavadat tejasāṃ nidhiḥ || 43-11 ||
analyzed: tatas prītaḥ sa bhagavān avadat tejasām nidhiḥ
aham sudarśanaḥ nāmnā khyātaḥ udya prabhṛti īśvara
durālokaḥ mahā lokaḥ yat tava aham sudarśanaḥ
vaikuṇṭhāt sva āgamanasya ahirbudhnya anujighṛkṣā hetuka tva ādi kathanam
vaikuṇṭha dhāma nilayaḥ tvām draṣṭum samupāgataḥ
tri bhāva bhāvanā yuktaiḥ adṛṣṭa caram adbhutam
nityam antarhitam guhyam sarva loka namaskṛtam
pramathya mati manthānāt uddhṛtam veda sāgarāt
pīyūṣam iva dugdha abdheḥ yat tvayā parameśvara

original: ato mantratanuḥ prāpto bhavantaṃ kiṃ karomi te || 43-15 ||
analyzed: atas mantra tanuḥ prāptaḥ bhavantam kim karomi te

original: antaraṃ naiva paśyāmi tava dāmodarasya ca |
analyzed: antaram nā eva paśyāmi tava dāmodarasya ca

original: ato yathātra varteya tathaiva tvayi śaṃkara || 43-16 ||
analyzed: atas yathā atra varteya tathā eva tvayi śaṃkara
tatas hirbudhnyena bhagavati sva abhipreta nivedanam
iti uktvā virate tasmin sahasra āditya saṃnibhe
tatas ham vismitā uvocam tam apratima tejasam
bhūyāṃsaḥ bhuvane pāpāḥ dharma vyāsedha kāriṇaḥ
teṣām nigraham ākāṅkṣan upāyaiḥ nāśayāmi aham

original: p. 416) iti cintāpare yogamāsthite mayi mantrarāṭ |
analyzed: iti cintā pare yogam āsthite mayi mantrarāj
tvam ca āvirāsīḥ tat kāryam nirvṛttam iti me matiḥ
daitya ādi vināśana prārthanā
atas taiḥ pīḍyamāneṣu sādhuṣu smṛti mātrataḥ

original: āgantavyaṃ prayatnena sādhyaṃ sādhaya ca prabho || 43-20 ||
analyzed: āgantavyam prayatnena sādhyam sādhaya ca prabho
bhagavatā tathā iti ukte svasya kailāsa gamanam
tathā iti uktvā gataḥ saḥ aham api kailāsam anvagām
atrā antare jalaṃdhara vadha artham indrasya mantra ālocanā
tatas jalaṃdhara ākhyena dānavena nipīḍitaḥ
vāsavaḥ mantrayāṃcakre saha sarvaiḥ marut gaṇaiḥ
śastraiḥ astraiḥ ajayya tvam dānavasya durātmanaḥ
nirīkṣya kena tam pāpam nāśayāmi iti acodayat
tatra vāyunā sva abhiprāya vinivedanam
tatas vāyuḥ samutthāya puraṃdaram atha abravīt
satyam astraiḥ tathā śastraiḥ ajayyaḥ yam mahā asuraḥ
dhātrā datta varaḥ dṛptaḥ bala vīrya samanvitaḥ
didhakṣati jagat sarvam dhūmaketuḥ iva utthitaḥ
sarva loka īśvare śrīmati aprameye mahā dyutau
devadeve mahādeve śaṃkare bhūtabhāvane
tasmin atyāhitam tena nṛśaṃsena surāriṇā

original: p. 417) tasmin paramasaṃkruddho vartate tena śaṃkaraḥ |
analyzed: tasmin parama saṃkruddhaḥ vartate tena śaṃkaraḥ
atas tam abhigacchāmaḥ vadha artham duṣṭa cāriṇaḥ
bṛhaspati mukhena eva tam devam prārthayāmahe

original: sa eva tatra vaktavyaṃ jānāti bhagavāniti || 43-28 ||
analyzed: saḥ eva tatra vaktavyam jānāti bhagavān iti
vāyu vacanam aṅgīkṛtya śaṃkaram gantum śakreṇa bṛhaspati pracodanam
virate pavane tasmin bāḍham iti āha vāsavaḥ
bṛhaspatim atha āsīnam jvalita anala saṃnibham
abhyagacchat mahā tejāḥ bhagavān pākaśāsanaḥ
jalaṃdhara vadha artham tvam abhigaccha pinākinam
sa tasmin parama kruddhaḥ nihaniṣyati asaṃśayam
sura kāryeṣu sarveṣu bhavān eva parāyaṇam
devaḥ kailāse candraśekharaḥ
indra vacanāt bṛhaspateḥ kailāsa gamanam
iti ukta vacane tasmin puruhūte sureśvare
tathā iti tat pratiśrutya vākpatiḥ śakra pūjitaḥ
kailāsa śikharam prāyāt prahṛṣṭena antarātmanā
tatra śaṃkara darśanam
tatra āsīnam suraiḥ sārdham āsthāne su manohare
mām apsaraḥ prayukte tu nṛtye vismita mānasam

śukla kṣauma vitāna āḍhyam kiṅkiṇī jāla bhūṣitam
bahu dhvaja samākīrṇam patākābhiḥ alaṃkṛtam
muktā dāma samākīrṇam bahu mālya pariṣkṛtam
kṣauma abhiveṣṭita stambham dīpikā samalaṃkṛtam
ṣaṭtriṃśat pada vistāram catuḥpañcāśatā padaiḥ
āyāmaiḥ saṃmitam ramyam maṅgala aṣṭaka saṃyutam
candana agaru dhūpena vāsitam viśvatas śivam
evam eva sarasvatyāḥ taṭe śuddhe purāt bahis

original: śīghraṃ kāraya kalyāṇa mā bhaiṣīrmā vicāraṇā || 45-37 ||
analyzed: śīghram kāraya kalyāṇa mā bhaiṣīḥ mā vicāraṇā
tatra sva āgamana pratijñā
tatra eva ca āgamiṣyāmi kariṣye karma śāntikam
yathopadeśam rājñaḥ anuṣṭhānam
evam uktavati prājñe gurau rājā viniryayau  /

original: p. 436) tataḥ sa paramaprītaḥ samāhūya ca kiṃkarān |
analyzed: tatas sa parama prītaḥ samāhūya ca kiṃkarān
yathā ukta lakṣaṇam tatra maṇḍapam samakārayat
yājñavalkyasya tad maṇḍapa gamanam
sva prabhāveṇa tad doṣam śaktaḥ śamayitum muniḥ
tathā api rājadharmā ūyam iti buddhyā vicintya saḥ

original: jagāma maṇḍapaṃ tatra śuklapakṣe śubhe dine |
analyzed: jagāma maṇḍapam tatra śukla pakṣe śubhe dine
maṇḍapasya paścima bhāge rāja āsana kalpanam
śilpinaḥ sa samāhūya rāja āsanam akalpayat  /
asya paścima digbhāge tṛtīye samalaṃkṛte
prāc bhāga dvayam adhyesya homakuṇḍāni akārayat  /
vimāna lakṣaṇa upeta vedikā sthala mūrdhasu
cakra ākṛtīni kuṇḍāni kalpayāmāsa sādaram
madhye aṣṭa dikṣu ca kuṇḍa kalpanā

original: tādṛśaṃ kuṇḍayugmaṃ tu madhye kṛtvā tato bahiḥ |
analyzed: tādṛśam kuṇḍa yugmam tu madhye kṛtvā tatas bahis
aṣṭāsu dikṣu kuṇḍāni tathā eva samakārayat
pratikuṇḍam ekaikasya madhye dvayoḥ ca kumbhayoḥ sthāpanam
pratikuṇḍam paristīrya kalamān bhāra saṃmitān
sthāpayāmāsa kuṇḍānām pūrva pārśveṣu sarvatas

original: p. 437) kumbhāni rājatānyaṣṭau sauvarṇe madhyame ubhe |
analyzed: kumbhāni rājatāni aṣṭau sauvarṇe madhyame ubhe
gandha toyena pūrṇāni navaratna yutāni ca
yājñavalkyena svayam kumbha arcanam

original: tataḥ svayaṃ muniḥ sārdhaṃ śatānandena dhīmatā |
analyzed: tatas svayam muniḥ sārdham śatānandena dhīmatā
kṣaumaiḥ tantubhiḥ āveṣṭya gandha puṣpaiḥ tathā akṣataiḥ
alaṃkṛtya ca kumbheṣu devam āvāhya sa ādaram
arcayāmāsa mantreṇa dhūpa dīpa prasūnakaiḥ
yantra pratiṣṭhā vilekhana ādi
devam vinā mahā yantram sarva mantra samanvitam
paṭe vilikhya pūrva uktam sarva divya astra saṃyutam
rāja āsane vikīrya etat tatas tat sa uttaracchadam
āropayāmāsa tadā rājānam amita ojasam
sa yantra paṭa saṃyuktam vitānam tasya ca akarot
nirmāya ca suvarṇena maṇi jāla pariṣkṛtam
yathā ukta lakṣaṇam yantram darpaṇe ca nyaveśayat
tathā eva gorocanayā bhūrja patre su saṃskṛte
suvarṇa sūcyā saṃlikhya yantram divya astra varjitam
śirasi adhārayat rājñaḥ yantram etat su mantritam
saudarśanena tilakam bhasmanā ca api akārayat
tatas ca aṣṭau samāhūya ṛtvijaḥ mantra niṣṭhitān
saṃyatān vaiṣṇavān viprān diśā kuṇḍeṣu ayojayat
tatas yavanikām kṛtvā maṇḍapasya samantataḥ
alaṃkṛteṣu kuṇḍeṣu sauvarṇaiḥ ca paricchadaiḥ
vidhāya vihitam pūrvam ṛtvigbhiḥ sahitaḥ guruḥ
śatānandena sahitaḥ juhāva jvaliteṣu saḥ
nṛtta vāditra saṃyuktam brahmaghoṣa samāyutam
puṇyāham pūrvam akarot homa karma samāhitaḥ
pradhāna karmaṇaḥ yuktau śatānandaḥ guruḥ tathā

original: diśāhomeṣu saṃyuktā ṛtvijaḥ sarva eva te || 45-59 ||
analyzed: diśā homeṣu saṃyuktāḥ ṛtvijaḥ sarve eva te
ājyaiḥ viśuddhaiḥ niyutam homān saṃkalpya sādaram
akarot ayutam nityam evam daśa dinam kṛtam

mukta grahaḥ viśuddha ātmā vijvaraḥ prīta mānasaḥ
pūrṇe daśa dine rājā ratnaiḥ bahu suvarṇakaiḥ
ārādhayāmāsa gurum maṇḍapam sa paricchadam
nivedya gurave sarvān ṛtvijaḥ samatarpayat
dhanaiḥ ca bahubhiḥ dhānyaiḥ pratiṣṭhābhiḥ samāhitaḥ

original: p. 439) praśaśāsa mahīmenāṃ divi devendravat sudhīḥ |
analyzed: praśaśāsa mahīm enām divi deva indra vat sudhīḥ
anyeṣām api bhūtānām ayam eva vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ
pañcāśat niyutaiḥ homaiḥ dvāpare sa vidhīyate
kalau ca koṭi homena vidhiḥ eṣa mahīkṣitām
prārabdham evam bhoktavyam karma brahma vidām api
iti śrī pañcarātre tantra rahasye ahirbudhnyasaṃhitāyām
kuśadhvajopākhyānavarṇanam nāma pañcacatvāriṃśaḥ adhyāyaḥ
āditaḥ ślokāḥ
sudarśana homa aṅga dravya parimāṇa ādi nirūpaṇam nāma
ṣaṭcatvāriṃśaḥ udhyāyaḥ
dhyātam sakṛt bhavān eka koṭi agha ogham harati aram

original: sudarśanasya tad divyaṃ bhargo devasya dhīmahi ||
analyzed: sudarśanasya tat divyam bhargaḥ devasya dhīmahi
rājñaḥ homa maṇḍapa anāgamane kartavya kramaḥ
nāradaḥ
daivāt vā mānuṣāt vā api bhūta ādibhiḥ atha api vā
darpāt pratibalāt vā anyaiḥ antarāyaiḥ mahīpatiḥ
yadi na prāpnuyāt eva homa maṇḍapam āditas
tatas katham mahībhartuḥ nivartyante mahā grahāḥ
ahirbudhnyaḥ

original: śṛṇu rājā na cet kuryāt purodhāḥ kurutāt kṛtī |
analyzed: śṛṇu rājā na ced kuryāt purodhāḥ kurutāt kṛtī
saḥ eva rājñaḥ sarva svam adṛṣṭa artha upapādane
purohita lakṣaṇam
dhārmikaḥ śruti saṃpannaḥ su śīlaḥ satya vāc śuciḥ
abhijātaḥ ūnahaṃkāraḥ titikṣuḥ smṛtimān vaśī
deśa kāla vibhāga jñaḥ śāstra dṛṣṭiḥ atandritaḥ
a pradhṛṣya upramādī ca vadānyaḥ naya kovidaḥ
upāya upeya vid mantrī yāyajūkaḥ hi a lolupaḥ

original: daivavit priyavādī ca vaidikaḥ sattvavān prabhuḥ || 46-6 ||
analyzed: daiva vid priya vādī ca vaidikaḥ sattvavān prabhuḥ
viṣṇu bhaktaḥ tapasvī ca kārya vid karmaṭhaḥ anaghaḥ
hita ahita āpti hāna icchuḥ nṛpāṇām sarva saṃmataḥ
purodhasaḥ eva rājñaḥ sarva kārya kartṛ tvam
īdṛśaḥ durlabhaḥ rājñām guru kalpaḥ purohitaḥ
īdṛśaḥ hi kṣamaḥ rājñām agha ogha vinivāraṇe

original: ataḥ sa eva rājñāṃ hi rakṣāvidhimathārhati |
analyzed: atas saḥ eva rājñām hi rakṣā vidhim atha arhati
evaṃvidhaḥ guruḥ yasya sa samrāj nṛpatiḥ bhavet
dīrgha āyuḥ niḥsapatnaḥ syāt arogaḥ para vīra hā
avagraha ādyāḥ jāyante pīḍāḥ tad viṣaye na hi
tādṛśa purohita abhāve rājñaḥ niṣṭa kathanam
tam vinā anyaḥ bhavet rājñaḥ guruḥ vā atha purohitaḥ
viparītam bhavet tasya mahībhartuḥ na saṃśayaḥ
kumbha ādīnām parimāṇa ādi praśnaḥ
nāradaḥ

original: parimāṇaṃ ca kumbhānāṃ sruksruvāṇāṃ ca lakṣaṇam |

ṛtvijaḥ kīdṛśaḥ hi asya prakāraḥ ca akhilam vada
uttama parimāṇam
ahirbudhnyaḥ

ardha bhāra bhṛtān kumbhān madhyamaḥ yam vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ
adhama parimāṇam
tad ardhena adhame pakṣe pūrayet eṣa nirṇayaḥ  /
yathāvidhi sruc ādi nirmāṇam

ṛtvij saṃkhyā
ṛtvijaḥ sāttvikān aṣṭau vṛṇuyāt vaiṣṇāvān tatas
aṅgamantraiḥ ca gāyatryā vahni prākārakeṇa ca

caruṇā pāyasa apūpaiḥ pālāśaiḥ juhuyāt kramāt
śuddhena sarpiṣā madhya kuṇḍayoḥ hāvayet guruḥ  /
athavā sarva kuṇḍeṣu śuddhena ājyena hāvayet
guruṇā eva abhinirvartye pratīkāra vidhau iha
śayana āsana yāna ādau rājñaḥ svaira vidhau api
pūrva uktena vidhānena vitāna ādikam ācaret
homa ante rājñaḥ abhiṣekaḥ

sthāpayitvā abhiṣeka ādi saskāram guruḥ ācaret

original: yathārhaṃ gurave dadyāt svacihnāni praṇamya ca |
analyzed: yathārham gurave dadyāt sva cihnāni praṇamya ca

pradhāna homa kartre viśeṣataḥ dakṣiṇā dānam
pradhāna homa kartre tu deśikāya viśeṣataḥ

original: p. 444) dadyād bahu dhanaṃ pūrṇamekamaśvaṃ savāhanam || 46-26 ||
analyzed: dadyāt bahu dhanam pūrṇam ekam aśvam sa vāhanam
alaṃkāreṇa sahitam maṇḍapam sa paricchadam
tatas brāhmaṇa tarpaṇam
brāhmaṇānām tatas tṛptim kuryāt prīta manāḥ nṛpaḥ
rājñā svena abhinirvṛtte karmaṇi asmin yathā udite

iti śrī pāñcarātre tantra rahasye ahirbudhnyasaṃhitāyām

ṣaṭcatvāriṃśaḥ udhyāyaḥ
āditaḥ ślokāḥ

analyzed: sudarśanasya tat divyam bhargaḥ devasya dhīmahi
aihika āmuṣmika sarva phala sādhaka eka upāya praśnaḥ
nāradaḥ
bhagavan pañca mantra aṅga paśu pāśa hara prabho
svatas sākṣātkṛta aśeṣa viśeṣa vyoma mandira
aihika āmuṣmikam śaśvat mantreṇa anena labhyate

original: ubhaye'pi tathā doṣā nāśyante nātra saṃśayaḥ || 47-2 ||
analyzed: ubhaye api tathā doṣāḥ nāśyante na atra saṃśayaḥ
iti uktam tena pṛcchāmi yena ekena eva karmaṇā
ubhayī siddhiḥ ubhaya aniṣṭa nāśaḥ bhavet tathā

original: īdṛśaṃ karma cedasti tanme kathaya śaṃkara |
analyzed: īdṛśam karma ced asti tat me kathaya śaṃkara
īdṛś grahasya tvattaḥ nyaḥ na kaścid vaktum arhati
tad uttara kathana ārambhaḥ
ahirbudhnyaḥ
tat etat kathayiṣyāmi sarva śānti karam param
vakṣyamāṇe karma viśeṣe rājñām adhikāraḥ
mahā rājaiḥ mahābhāgaiḥ prayojyam vyasta jātibhiḥ
ādhyātmika ādi duḥkhānām trayāṇām api nāśanam
ādhīnām ca api aśeṣāṇām nāśanam śubha lakṣaṇam
sarva ari nāśanam śāntam mahā vijaya kāraṇam
rakṣaḥ haṇam puṣṭi karam sarva vaśyā karam mune
parama āyuḥ pradam puṇyam pūrvaiḥ nṛpatibhiḥ kṛtam
ambarīṣa prabhṛtīnām etad anuṣṭhānāt yathā ukta phala lābhaḥ
ambarīṣaḥ śuka ularkaḥ māṃdhātā ca purūravāḥ
rājā uparicaraḥ dhundhuḥ śibiḥ ca śrutakīrtanaḥ
kṛtvā etat cakravarti tvam purā prāpuḥ amī nṛpāḥ
nirāmayāḥ niḥsapatnāḥ vistīrṇa amala kīrtayaḥ
tatra rājñām adhikāra nigamanam
atas mānuṣam ānandam kāṅkṣantaḥ bhuvi bhūbhujaḥ
kuryuḥ etat mahā śānti lakṣaṇam karma sādaram
deśa viśeṣa vidhiḥ
purāt bahis mahānadyāḥ taṭe
asaṃbādhe śive deśe vivikte sa jalāśaye
pūrva ukta lakṣaṇa yutāt maṇḍapāt adhikam mune
kuryāt āyāma vistārau tathā rāja āsana anvitam
tat tat samantataḥ kuryāt evaṃlakṣaṇam uttamam
bahu stambha samākīrṇam maṇi kāñcana maṇḍitam
tuṅga toraṇa saṃyuktam dīpikā śata śobhitam
kiṅkiṇī jāla saṃyuktam patākābhiḥ alaṃkṛtam
sa vitānam sa sopānam sarva alaṃkāra saṃyutam
candana aguru karpūra dhūpa mālā adhivāsitam
tuṅga sāla samāyuktam homaśālā abhiveṣṭitam

original: evaṃ manojña kṛtvaitat tatra kuṇḍāni kalpayet |
analyzed: evam manojña kṛtvā etat tatra kuṇḍāni kalpayet
prāgbhāge maṇḍapasya asya catur dikṣu prakalpayet
catur vyūha abhiyoga artham caturaśrāṇi kārayet
prācya ādyāni atha kuṇḍāni keśava ādīn atho yajet
caturṇām keśava ādīnām vikoṇeṣu prakalpayet
kuṇḍāni śeṣa mūrtīnām tad chidreṣu yathākramam
tri aśram ṣaṣ aśram ardha indum yonim padma ākṛtim kramāt
vṛttam padma ābham aṣṭāśram vajra ākṛti dhanuḥ prabham

original: p. 448) madhye devaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yantrarūpadharaṃ prabhum || 47-21 ||
analyzed: madhye devam pratiṣṭhāpya yantra rūpa dharam prabhum

yathārham astra liṅgāni maṇḍitāni atha kārayet
ṛtvij varaṇam
antar maṇḍapa kuṇḍeṣu ṛtvijaḥ ṣoḍaśa kramāt
ṛgbhiḥ puruṣasūktābhiḥ vṛṇuyāt vaiṣṇavān satas
astrakuṇḍeṣu ṛtvij antara varaṇam
tatas sva nāmabhiḥ ca ante vṛṇuyāt vedapāragān
bāhya astra kuṇḍa śālāyām brahmāstra pramukheṣu api
ṛtvijaḥ vṛṇuyāt sarvān kuśalān śānti karmaṇi

tatra eva atha bhava mitraḥ iti pañcabhiḥ anvitaḥ
paras mātṛ ādibhiḥ ṛgbhiḥ trayodaśabhiḥ eva ca  /
viṣṇusūkta gatābhiḥ ca asya vāmā iti pañcabhiḥ
atas deva iti ṣaḍbhiḥ ca daśabhiḥ cakṣuḥ iti api

original: ṣaḍbhiḥ prati va eneti vṛṇuyāt svasvanāmabhiḥ |

ṣaṣ āmnāya stṛyamānaḥ ṣaṣ āmnāya antara sthitaḥ
sakāra ādīni viṃśatiḥ
hakāra ādīni catuḥṣaṣṭiḥ
heti saṃtati saṃpūrṇaḥ heti maṇḍala maṇḍitaḥ
heti dāna paraḥ sarva heti ugra paribhūṣitaḥ
haṃsa dṛś gocara tanuḥ haṃsa saṃgīta toṣitaḥ
haṃsa vat sundara tanuḥ haṃsa saṃgata mānasaḥ
kṣakāra ādīni dvādaśa nāmāni
kṣīrārṇava samudbhūtaḥ kṣīra saṃbhava bhāvitaḥ
kṣīra abhiṣeka saṃtuṣṭa kṣīra pāna abhilāṣukaḥ
phala śrutiḥ
iti etat kathitam divyam sarva pāpa praṇāśanam
sarva adāridrya śamanam sarva upadrava nāśanam
nāmnām sahasram divyānām cakrarājasya tad pateḥ
nāmāni heti rājasya ye paṭhanti iha mānavāḥ

original: teṣāṃ bhavanti sakalāḥ saṃpado nātra saṃśayaḥ || 119 ||
analyzed: teṣām bhavanti sakalāḥ saṃpadaḥ na atra saṃśayaḥ
iti ahirbudhnyasaṃhitāyām tantra rahasye vyāsa nārada saṃvāde
śrī sudarśana sahasranāma stotram saṃpūrṇam

original: 1  yathoktānāṃ nāmnāṃ parigaṇane, teṣāṃ saṃkhyā ṣaṣṭyuttarāṇi
analyzed: yathā uktānām nāmnām parigaṇane teṣām saṃkhyā ṣaṣṭi uttarāṇi
pañca śatāni na atikrāmati tatra kim etāvatsu eva nāmasu

original: sahasranāmaśabda aupacārikaḥ prayuktaḥ, uta madhye madhye
analyzed: sahasranāmaśabda aupacārikaḥ prayuktaḥ uta madhye madhye
grantha lopāt nāma sahasra saṃkhyāyāḥ apūrtiḥ iti prabalatareṇa pramāṇena
vinā sahasranāma śabdasya aupacārika tva kalpanā anaucityam
grantha lopa āvaśyaka tām udbhāvayati ādarśīkṛtayoḥ ajñāta paraspara
vṛttāntayoḥ bhinna deśāt ānītayoḥ dvayoḥ mātṛkā kośayoḥ daivāt āpatita
mā aikarūpyam tu grantha lopa sadbhāva śaṅkām pratiruṇaddhi
